item.description:
If you are attending Swadhi's event, then DO NOT RSVP NO.

I already know that you are not coming.

Meet at 6 pm for Coffee inside the Barnes & Noble Bookstore at the Starbucks

section.

This MU is separate from the Movie because there are

Some who might want to come for coffee but cannot

Stay for the movie.

Those coming for coffee and the movie, then please

RSVP Yes for the movie as well.  Sorry about

this if it is confusing to some.

 

Swadhi is having in Cheshire on the same day.

Some of you might rather have coffee

in North Haven and/or then

go see a movie.

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at North Haven Barnes & Noble in the Starbucks section.
item.name: Coffee Talk: Starbucks in North H. Barnes & Noble
